meanings.sent1: She is preestablishing the rules for the game before we start playing.
meanings.sent2: The team is preestablishing their strategy for the upcoming match.
meanings.sent3: By preestablishing the plan, they avoided any confusion later on.
meanings.sent4: The teacher preestablished the guidelines to ensure a smooth classroom experience.
meanings.sent5: Preestablishing the schedule helped everyone stay organized and on track.

meanings.sent1: He is preestablishing the equipment for the event later today.
meanings.sent2: The company is preestablishing the budget for the next fiscal year.
meanings.sent3: By preestablishing the decorations, they saved time on the day of the party.
meanings.sent4: The team preestablished the meeting agenda to make sure everything was covered.
meanings.sent5: Preestablishing the project timeline allowed for better time management.
